document.full_text: a stubborn wildfire in eastern arizona that has forced the evacuation of as many as 3,000 people flared out of control for a 10th day on tuesday and advanced on two more mountain towns near new mexico.
document.title: eastern arizona wildfire displaces up to 3,000 people
lines_and_colors: a stubborn wildfire in eastern arizona that has forced the evacuation of as many as 3,000 people flared out of control for a 10th day on tuesday and advanced on two more mountain towns near new mexico.
